author: kfujino
msg: Do not set the nodes that failed to replication to the backup nodes.
Ensure that the nodes that the data has been successfully replicated are set to the backup node.

msg: Do not set the nodes that failed to replication to the backup nodes.

author: markt
msg: Delegate and filter() should be used consistently everywhere delegation is possible to ensure consistent behaviour of the class loader.
